name: Block Merger - One Hexa Puzzle
description:
Block Mania is addictive block puzzle game. Main goal is to fill the grid with the different color shapes.

HOW TO PLAY
- drag and drop the blocks
- fill the whole grid

FEATURES
- simple gameplay
- easy to play
- no time limit for solving puzzles
- over 100+ levels

Easy to play, and recommended game for all ages.
